properties.areaDesc: S of Oregon Inlet NC to Cape Hatteras NC out to 20 nm; S of Cape Hatteras NC to Ocracoke Inlet NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 6 at 6:23PM EST until January 8 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...QUICK MOVING STORM SYSTEM TO BRING GALES TO COASTAL WATERS
TUESDAY AFTERNOON AND TUESDAY NIGHT...

.Winds will increase quickly late Tuesday morning and afternoon
with Gale Force conditions expected by mid afternoon. SW winds
around 25 to 35 knots, with gusts 40 to 45 knots expected ahead
of the cold front, and then will turn to the west-northwest
behind the front early Tuesday night. Seas will build to 6 to
10 feet by Tuesday evening. Conditions gradually improve
Wednesday.

* WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 kt with gusts up to 40 kt,
becoming west Tuesday evening, and seas 6 to 9 feet expected.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Oregon Inlet to Ocracoke Inlet.

* WHEN...From 3 PM Tuesday to 2 AM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM TUESDAY TO 2 AM EST WEDNESDAY
